tasks.title: Phase 1: Resolve Architectural Violations
tasks.description: Address critical architectural issues preventing a clean build, including forbidden dependencies like 'vscode' and 'Deno'.
tasks.details: Remove vscode and Deno imports. The file `src/terminal/vscode-bridge.ts` is a primary target.
tasks.testStrategy: Run `npm run build` and confirm no errors related to `vscode` or `Deno` are present.

tasks.title: Phase 2: Fix Configuration Errors
tasks.details: Audit `tsconfig.json` compiler options, module resolution, and path aliases. Resolve conflicts between linter and TSC regarding module extensions. Audit `package.json` for dependency issues.
tasks.testStrategy: The build should proceed past the configuration stage without errors.

tasks.title: Phase 3: Resolve Import/Module Resolution Errors
tasks.description: Fix all 'Cannot find module' (e.g., TS2307) errors.
tasks.details: Systematically fix all broken import paths and ensure all required type definitions are installed.
tasks.testStrategy: Run `npm run build` and confirm all module resolution errors are gone.

tasks.title: Phase 4: Fix Type-Checking Errors
tasks.description: Fix all remaining TypeScript type-checking errors.
tasks.details: Address all remaining `TS2339`, `TS2345`, and similar type errors until the build is clean.
tasks.testStrategy: Run `npm run build` to completion with zero errors.
